casebody.data:
Monitz Cohn, Appellant, v. Edward H. Ammidown, et al., Respondents. Decided July 2, 1886. Plaintiffs exception ordered to be heard in first instance at general term. Leonard Brown, for plaintiff. A. P. Whitehead, for defendants.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., and O’Gorman, J.

Opinion by Sedgwick, Ch. J. Exception overruled and judgment for dismissal of complaint, with costs.
